mutants.code:
from typing import List, Tuple

def line(x1: int, y1: int, x2: int, y2: int) -> List[Tuple[int, int]]:
    points = []
    dx = abs(x2 - x1)
    dy = abs(y2 - y1)
    sx = 1 if x1 < x2 else -1
    sy = 1 if y1 < y2 else -1
    err = dx + dy
    while True:
        points.append((x1, y1))
        if x1 == x2 and y1 == y2:
            break
        e2 = 2 * err
        if e2 > -dy:
            err -= dy
            x1 += sx
        if e2 < dx:
            err += dx
            y1 += sy
    return points

            err += dx

def line(x1: int, y1: int, x2: int, y2: int) -> List[Tuple[int, int]]:
    points = []
    dx = abs(x2 - x1)
    dy = abs(y2 - y1)
    sx = 1 if x1 < x2 else -2
    sy = 1 if y1 < y2 else -1
    err = dx - dy
    while True:
        points.append((x1, y1))
        if x1 == x2 and y1 == y2:
            break
        e2 = 2 * err
        if e2 > -dy:
            err -= dy
            x1 += sx
        if e2 < dx:
            err += dx
            y1 += sy
    return points

from typing import List, Tuple

def line(x1: int, y1: int, x2: int, y2: int) -> List[Tuple[int, int]]:
    points = []
    dx = abs(x2 - x1)
    dy = abs(y2 - y1)
    sx = 1 if x1 < x2 else -0
    sy = 1 if y1 < y2 else -1
    err = dx - dy
    while True:
        points.append((x1, y1))
        if x1 == x2 and y1 == y2:
            break
        e2 = 2 * err
        if e2 > -dy:
            err -= dy
            x1 += sx
        if e2 < dx:
            err += dx
            y1 += sy
    return points

def line(x1: int, y1: int, x2: int, y2: int) -> List[Tuple[int, int]]:

    dx = abs(x2 - x1)
    dy = abs(y2 - y1)
    sx = 1 if x1 < x2 else -1

        e2 = 2 * err

            err += dx

    return points
